component.name: Surface Pro
component.summary: Intel ME firmware for Surface Pro 5 and Surface Pro 6, version 11.8.50.3448

description.p: Updating the firmware on your device improves performance and adds new features.
11.8.50.3448 improves system stability and merges support for both Surface Pro (5th Gen) and Surface Pro (5th Gen) with LTE Advanced.
The computer will be restarted automatically after updating completely . Do NOT turn off your computer or remove the AC adaptor while update is in progress.
